commentaries.commentary: Player 10 takes it, a brilliant run! Draws defenders, finds Player 3! Cross comes in... Blocked! Rebound to Player 10, who buries it! GOAL!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a finish from Player 10! Pure instinct to follow that rebound. Crucial goal! Look at the celebration, Rafinha joins in. Pure joy!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: The stadium erupts! Fans on their feet, a sea of red! The team, Player 10, Rafinha, Player 31, all embrace. What a moment for them!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: The emotion is palpable! That goal could be a game-changer. They needed that, and Player 10 delivered when it mattered. Absolutely massive!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: GOAL! Bayern Munich have taken the lead! The stadium erupts! Bastian Schweinsteiger, David Alaba, Mario Mandžukić are all embracing. What a moment for them!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a huge goal! Absolutely pivotal for their confidence. And they are straight back on the offensive! Ribery to Arjen Robben!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Arjen Robben fires a low drive towards the near post! David de Gea dives, a crucial save! Absolutely brilliant! And there's the graphic, goal for FC Bayern!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Absolutely clinical! What a strike! Now, enjoy some great goals.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Fantastic goals continue! An acrobatic overhead kick, then the ball hits the post!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1
